EmailTemplate.description: Sends to Finance when Date adhoc advance requested is entered and 3 days have passed with no action on the record
EmailTemplate.name: Ad hoc advance: approval request reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Please review a {!Job_placement__c.Ad_hoc_advance_urgency__c} priority ad hoc advance request from {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate__c}
